quote: I won't let those distorted lies deceive me anymore... And I won't be led astray by others' voices either... I'm going to trust my own eyes and my own heart to distinguish the truth from the lies.
Risking our lives to stop rotten adults... That's why we're Phantom Thieves!

I guess my fears turned out to be true... The real world is a scary place... Pain like this can never reach you if you keep yourself cooped up indoors... Who am I to think I can tell the people what to do? I mean, I used to be a shut in myself... Dammit... I just wanna go home... But even that would be tough now. Giving up would be too painful. You know, I think... I've changed. I don't know when it happened... But I can't... I can't let people suffer like this, even if I don't know them personally.
I know it's kinda weird to ask... but having a reward waiting at the finish line will totally push me onward...!
Welp, ain't no time like the present! Come on, let's go!
...I don't wanna be talented if it's gonna creep people out.
Youth... The unknown frontier...
I hate being such a coward... But I think I might be able to face my fears now that I'm a promising-settling Phantom Thief!
Life doesn't feel the same when you're not with me.
Is this feeling... 'love'? I've always heard it's the most intense joy in the world...

My whole world is expanding. Every day brings new and different discoveries. The direction of Sojiro's cowlick, the atmosphere of Yongen, the various types of coffee beans... Things might be the exact same as they were yesterday, but from my perspective, it's all spinning.
I just hope I can change little by little...like everyone else does.

You gave me something really important. You gave me my life back. It's thanks to you that I learned I'm fine just as I am... and that I learned to trust my mom again. I was as good as dead, but you resurrected me.
If I only act for my own sake, I can't put all my full effort into it anymore. But when I remember my friends... and you... it's like I'm tapping into some kind of unknown power!
You gave me my life back, so it's my turn to risk my life for you.
Oh, there you are! Merry Christmas!
Today's kinda special, so... I feel a little more nervous than usual.
Christmas is canceled! They can't be sold out everywhere! It's not Christmas if we can't get roasted chicken!
Um, 'scuse me? Do you have any Christmas cake left?
Yeah, game... over?
If we were in one of those cooking animes, this cake would be blasting people's clothes off!
What's my secret? That's easy: Never give up! Trust your instincts! Mwhehehe...
I, uh... got you a little present. And I figured we might as well have matching ones. This way...  you can look at it sometimes and think of me.
Man. Christmas is super fun. I'd have never learned that if it weren't for you falling in love with me. Thank you...
Alright! Time to enter Phase Two of our Christmas bash! Party: transform!
It's snowing even harder now. It's a lot prettier now that we're not stuck in some crowd...
I've never had a Christmas like this before. My world just keeps getting bigger... I'm super happy. So much that it's a little scary.
Hey. It's pretty cold, right? So... is it cool if I sit a little closer?
I refuse to quit! Our new quest: securing a cake! Onward!
Let everyone be merry to the max!
Nobody's gonna come to this run-down caf√©. Dude, Christmas.
This is incredible! It's an actual, real-life good ending!
I don't have any proof, but I feel like next year's gonna be even better for us.
Next year... Sojiro! Osechi Time! Get those New Year's dishes ready, chop chop! And don't forget the black beans!
Believe it, or don't: only three-sixty-four days until the next one!
I'm gonna hit up some New Year's sales with my mom!
Hehe, drunk on the spirit of the new year already, huh?
As your teammate... and, um, your girlfriend... I gotta ask... From now on... don't shut me out. Let me help when things get hard.
Next up, we got... Chocolates! Cause you know, Valentine's Day. It's a thing.
I guess we're back in the canon reality, huh? Still... I think it was probably the right decision. It's still hard sometimes, but I'm making progress.

I only wanted one thing when I joined the Phantom Thieves. To find out why my mom died. But now, I've got one more person to help. Not even as a phantom thief, either. It's not about rescuing him. It's about... doing all I can to make him happy.

There wasn't anyone I knew with me, so I panicked. Felt like my heart was gonna pop... I got so scared all by myself... then I just sorta curled up into a ball... Then all these people started staring at me... and the police came... and then it was all over...
But I'm okay outside as long as it's with Joker... Is he some kinda key item? Please! Be my key item!

Oh, I should make a promise list! My mom used to have me do that all the time. She'd write all my goals for the month, like cleaning the house or running errands for her. Then when I'd finish one, she'd mark it off with a big stamp. She always used to write comments too... Those were the best. Oh, and once I finished all my goals, she would take a day off work to spend time with me.

So, these are my promises. 1. Go somewhere with lots of people. Getting used to big crowds is key. 2. Go to school. I wanna see what the inside of a normal high school looks like. 3. Learn about my generation. I definitely need more info... 4. Have a normal conversation with a stranger my age.
Mayday, mayday... I'm trapped in the Home Appliance Kingdom... The Three Terabyte War rages on outside...
I dunno though... I panicked hard when I was soloing that dungeon... I think... not being with you is kinda scary.

Lunch... That reminds me of this time I was the only kid who didn't get a pudding with my meal... Oh, and this other time I ate a strawberry with ketchup on it... I didn't notice 'cause they're both red. It was really gross...

Back in elementary school, I memorized the titles of all the books on a shelf in just one glance. The other kids thought I was making it up when I told them though. But then when I recited all the titles to prove it... they just laughed and called me a freak...
I guess dwelling on the past is just a bad habit of mine, huh?
Hrmhrmhrm. It seems like help always comes my way when I need it most. Maybe my luck stat's really high. I could prolly roll a natural twenty right now if you asked me to!
This overwhelmingly forgettable appearance, generic speech style, and total lack of sex appeal... Nishima, are you an NPC?
My life at school was horrible. Sometimes during recess, I'd lock myself in the bathroom and cry... I didn't have a single friend... I was always alone.

I... I wish I could apologize to Kana-chan somehow. I really wanna say I'm sorry... Sorry for not helping her, though she was going through even worse stuff than I was... Sorry for reading her diary... Sorry... for running away...
C-Can you... pat me on the head? Mom used to do it when she was happy with me. Just... pat pat.
Honestly, I've been feeling kinda weird lately... My heart's been beating real fast when we're together... Then even when we're apart, I can't stop thinking about you...
Hrm... Being a girlfriend is hard. Is this something I'm gonna get used to? I-In any case, I'm gonna do my best to be a great girlfriend! Watch me!
T-Then... I finished the Promise List? I got the platinum!? I did it! The trophy's gonna pop in the upper right of my room here, right?

There wasn't anyone I knew with me, so I panicked. Felt like my heart was gonna pop... I got so scared all by myself... then I just sorta curled up into a ball... Then all these people started staring at me... and the police came... and then it was all over...
But I'm okay outside as long as it's with Joker... Is he some kinda key item? Please! Be my key item!

Then when I'd finish one, she'd mark it off with a big stamp. She always used to write comments too... Those were the best. I guess dwelling on the past is just a bad habit of mine, huh?

Hrm... Being a girlfriend is hard. Is this something I'm gonna get used to? I-In any case, I'm gonna do my best to be a great girlfriend! Watch me!
T-Then... I finished the Promise List? I got the platinum!? I did it! The trophy's gonna pop in the upper right of my room here, right?
Not surprised. As a member of the opposite sex, I sense no charm from you, Ryuji.
